markdown:
<title level="1" right="Background " pfs="Standard">[Shory Seeker](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=100)</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 94 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Region** Mwangi Expanse

</column>

You’ve dedicated your life to unraveling the secrets of the ancient Shory Empire, either through meticulous research or by traveling into dangerous and distant ruins to track down long- lost artifacts.

Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Dexterity
or Intelligence, and one is a free ability boost.

You're trained in the [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) skill, and the [Shory Lore](/skills/lore) skill. You gain the [Specialty Crafting](/Feats.aspx?ID=844) skill feat.
name: Shory Seeker

text: Shory Seeker Source World Guide pg. 94 2.0 Region Mwangi Expanse You’ve dedicated your life to unraveling the secrets of the ancient Shory Empire, either through meticulous research or by traveling into dangerous and distant ruins to track down long- lost artifacts. Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Dexterity or Intelligence, and one is a free ability boost. You're trained in the Crafting skill, and the Shory Lore skill. You gain the Specialty Crafting skill feat.
